self.name: channels.editAdmin
self.description: Modify the admin rights of a user in a supergroup/channel.
self.descriptionExcerpt: Modify the admin rights of a user in a supergroup/channel.

arguments.name: userId
arguments.description: The ID of the user whose admin rights should be modified

arguments.name: rank
arguments.description: Indicates the role (rank) of the admin in the group: just an arbitrary string

throws.description: There are too many admins
throws.name: ADMINS_TOO_MUCH

throws.description: There are too many bots in this chat/channel
throws.name: BOTS_TOO_MUCH

throws.description: Bots can't edit admin privileges
throws.name: BOT_CHANNELS_NA

throws.description: This bot can't be added to groups
throws.name: BOT_GROUPS_BLOCKED

throws.description: The provided channel is invalid
throws.name: CHANNEL_INVALID

throws.description: You haven't joined this channel/supergroup
throws.name: CHANNEL_PRIVATE

throws.description: You do not have the rights to do this
throws.name: CHAT_ADMIN_INVITE_REQUIRED

throws.description: You must be an admin in this chat to do this
throws.name: CHAT_ADMIN_REQUIRED

throws.description: You can't write in this chat
throws.name: CHAT_WRITE_FORBIDDEN

throws.description: You were just elected admin, you can't add or modify other admins yet
throws.name: FRESH_CHANGE_ADMINS_FORBIDDEN

throws.description: The specified user was deleted
throws.name: INPUT_USER_DEACTIVATED

throws.description: The provided peer id is invalid
throws.name: PEER_ID_INVALID

throws.description: Your admin rights do not allow you to do this
throws.name: RIGHT_FORBIDDEN

throws.description: The maximum number of users has been exceeded (to create a chat, for example)
throws.name: USERS_TOO_MUCH

throws.description: User blocked
throws.name: USER_BLOCKED

throws.description: One of the users you tried to add is already in too many channels/supergroups
throws.name: USER_CHANNELS_TOO_MUCH

throws.description: You can't leave this channel, because you're its creator
throws.name: USER_CREATOR

throws.description: The provided user ID is invalid
throws.name: USER_ID_INVALID

throws.description: The provided user is not a mutual contact
throws.name: USER_NOT_MUTUAL_CONTACT

throws.description: The user's privacy settings do not allow you to do this
throws.name: USER_PRIVACY_RESTRICTED

throws.description: You're spamreported, you can't create channels or chats.
throws.name: USER_RESTRICTED
